Html:
I've installed various versions of MVVM Light over the past 3 years and I'm trying to install the latest to get the latest DLLs. I think I've uninstalled all the previous versions, but I probably have little bits and pieces left around.

Anyhow, I'm trying to install the latest 2012 version (MvvmLight.VS2012.vsix), and it installs the templates, but the DLLs are no where to be found. When I create a project using one of the templates, the compiler can't find the referenced DLLs either.

I just want the DLLs. I don't care about the templates

Hi,

The templates should find the DLLs, they get installed with the VSIX.

Nonetheless, if you only want the DLLs, the best solution is to use Nuget and use the "mvvmlight" search word and then "Libraries only".

cheers
Laurent
